data.system_settings: LG Fortune, Android 6.0.1, Windows 10 Pro, x64 (v1803)
data.actual_result: Android makes way more Audit Log content than PC.
data.expected_result: There are same amount of audit log contents made.
data.short_description: Android Audit Log makes more audit log content compared to the Desktop.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role. - Then, change the role's name. - Next, grant a permission on the role you made. - Check audit log for both Desktop and Android.
